## Validate.isValidContextToken() function

Determines whether a string is a valid context token. Context tokens are pipe-separated lists of context qualifier tokens.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isValidContextToken(token: string): token is ContextToken;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

token


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

the string to validate.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

token is [ContextToken](./ts-res.contexttoken.md)

`true` if the string is a valid context token, `false` otherwise.
